# The `CoalescingBitVector` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A bitvector that, under the hood, relies on an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intervalmap">IntervalMap</a> to coalesce elements into intervals. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename IndexT&gt;
class llvm::CoalescingBitVector&lt;IndexT&gt;</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

A bitvector that, under the hood, relies on an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intervalmap">IntervalMap</a> to coalesce elements into intervals.

Good for representing sets which predominantly contain contiguous ranges. Bad for representing sets with lots of gaps between elements.

Compared to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparsebitvector">SparseBitVector</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector">CoalescingBitVector</a> offers more predictable performance for non-sequential <a href="#a84519c831af8bdd490359710a57bea17">find()</a> operations.


<ParametersList title="Template Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="IndexT">- The type of the index into the bitvector.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h">CoalescingBitVector.h</a>.

Set union.

If <code>RHS</code> is guaranteed to not overlap with this, <a href="#a01f3632c0200ff6d2cd9e1c41fb28884">set</a> may be a faster alternative.

### clear() {#a9e7737b1b195e7a4787a06762dc58ee5}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IndexT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::CoalescingBitVector&lt; IndexT &gt;::clear ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Clear all the bits.

### find() {#a84519c831af8bdd490359710a57bea17}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IndexT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>const&#95;iterator llvm::CoalescingBitVector&lt; IndexT &gt;::find (IndexT Index) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return an iterator pointing to the first set bit AT, OR AFTER, <code>Index</code>.

If no such set bit exists, return <a href="#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end()</a>. This is like std::lower&#95;bound. This has worst-case logarithmic performance (roughly O(log(gaps between
contiguous ranges))).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h/#l00354">354</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h">CoalescingBitVector.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### set() {#a01f3632c0200ff6d2cd9e1c41fb28884}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IndexT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::CoalescingBitVector&lt; IndexT &gt;::set (IndexT Index)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the bit at <code>Index</code>.

This method does /not/ support setting a bit that has already been set, for efficiency reasons. If possible, restructure your code to not set the same bit multiple times, or use <a href="#af020db0e9eae4b30ee1280fc8252c36b">test&#95;and&#95;set</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h">CoalescingBitVector.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### set() {#adda8ae7ed8c5cb9a55ebed6dc502f829}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename IndexT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::CoalescingBitVector&lt; IndexT &gt;::set (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector">ThisT</a> &amp; Other)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the bits set in <code>Other</code>.

This method does /not/ support setting already-set bits, see <a href="#a01f3632c0200ff6d2cd9e1c41fb28884">set</a> for the rationale. For a safe set union operation, use <a href="#a282e4fe888bd7353949e898f2b082aec">operator|=</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/coalescingbitvector-h">CoalescingBitVector.h</a>.
